Caave Mission Tutorial:
The Cave of Queen Ant:
This mission is intended for beginners, you can acquire your initial items by completing this mission. First you must defeat all the ant who defend Ant Larva, and finally kill Ant Larva so that Queen Ant comes out of her hiding place, defeats her and completes the mission. (You must be in Party and have a minimum level 50 and a maximum 55).
